meanings.definition: A social group consisting of people who are disadvantaged and have low income or status.
meanings.sent1: The underclass in our community struggles to make ends meet.
meanings.sent2: The underclass often faces barriers to accessing quality education.
meanings.sent3: The underclass picnic had a theme of turning trash into treasure.
meanings.sent4: In the garden of society, the underclass are the forgotten seeds waiting to bloom.
meanings.sent5: The underclass is like a hidden treasure chest waiting to be discovered.

meanings.definition: The lowest social stratum in a society, below the working class.
meanings.sent1: Living conditions in the underclass neighborhoods are often substandard.
meanings.sent2: Members of the underclass may struggle to afford basic necessities.
meanings.sent3: The underclass party had a 'bottom of the barrel' theme.
meanings.sent4: In the hierarchy of society, the underclass is the foundation that supports all.
meanings.sent5: The underclass is like the base of a pyramid, holding everything else up.
